mapper.select: SELECT u.id_ as userName, g.id_ as groupId, g.name_ as groupName, g.type_ as type FROM ACT_ID_USER u, ACT_ID_GROUP g, ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP m WHERE u.ID_ = #{userName} AND u.ID_ = m.USER_ID_ AND m.GROUP_ID_ = g.ID_;
